LanguageData.VF_CommandDockShipDesc: Unload all passengers and enable trade with the Settlement of {0}.
LanguageData.VF_CommandDockShipObjectDesc: Dock Boats and go on foot
LanguageData.VF_CommandUndockShipDesc: Load all pawns and items into Boats
LanguageData.VF_CommandAttackDockDisable: Cannot attack {0} while docked at their Settlement
LanguageData.VF_CommandTradeDockDisable: Cannot trade with {0}. Must dock boat first
LanguageData.VF_CaravanMustHaveEnoughSpaceOnShip: Not enough space on ships to house all pawns.
LanguageData.VF_CaravanMustHaveEnoughPawnsToOperate: Not enough Pawns selected to set sail. Need {0}
LanguageData.VF_CaravanMustHaveAtLeastOneVehicle: Must have at least 1 vehicle selected in order to choose a route.
LanguageData.VF_CommandReformVehicleCaravanDesc: Reform vehicle caravan with vehicles selected.
